categories: Category:Sith Lords of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tritos Nal was a humanoid Sith Lord of the old Sith Empire.

Nal was a master of Sith magic and proficient in the art of Sith alchemy. He based the majority of his work in his workshop on Korriz. Tritos was a loyal friend of the Sith Lord Garu, and he used his skills to craft a powerful Sith sword for him.
